fields.name: All tools
fields.description: Run all tools with the most relevant configurations. This process covers all the pentesting stages from OSINT to exploits finding.

fields.name: HTTP Analysis
fields.description: Analysis of HTTP services after port enumeration. Search for endpoints, TLS vulnerabilities, CMS information, Log4Shell, etc.

fields.name: FTP Analysis
fields.description: Analysis of FTP services using nmap with NSE scripts.

fields.name: SSH Analysis
fields.description: Analysis of SSH services after port enumeration, using ssh-audit.

fields.name: SMB Analysis
fields.description: Analysis of SMB services using nmap with NSE scripts and smbmap.

fields.name: OSINT
fields.description: Run OSINT tools to gather publicly available information.

fields.name: Active Analysis
fields.description: Run all active tools with the most relevant configurations. This process covers all active pentesting stages from enumeration to exploits finding.
